title: Project skins unavailable?
body: Literally just bought 35$ worth of RP to buy some of the new project skins only to find out they're unavailable right now. What gives?

replies.body: Likewise, weren't they supposed to be disabled on Wed 3:00pm, not now?

> [{quoted}](name=Sir SandyCroc,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=u5l5jmNJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-15T15:56:36.488+0000)
>
> Likewise, weren't they supposed to be disabled on Wed 3:00pm, not now?

They were disabled on the 15th so people only had till midnight yesterday to purchase them with the first strike border I believe! but riot did have problems with them before when they first came out, so that may be the case

**OCE** website specifically states:
 
"PROJECT: FIRST STRIKE
UNTIL 9/15 23:59 **PDT** "

I believe AEST is 18 hours ahead of PDT so was expecting First Strike to go down at 5:59pm on the 16th of September **AEST**.

Unsure whether there was a communication error but hope they put it back up, was planning to get PROJECT:Lucian First Strike today :/.
It isnt midnight yet is it?

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/skins-project/#!extras

The skins will be disabled on midnight of the 15th to remove the "first strike" version and add the normal version on the 17th (with discounted price)
All new project skins except Master Yi's will be 975 RP for a week

So the skins will be unavailable today.
In the same Boat =[ Yo Riot you don't want my money?
It is happening to me too! What happen?
